Articles.Content:
hallo Kerbal community

what a happy day this is to greet ya all

so lets get down to business shall we ?

the problem i had was the lag during my crazy 1000+ part contraptions...

crazy lagggg i mean non playble so i went about trying out every single adjustment in the settings...

and i found the bar in the input menu "Max Physics delta-time Per Frame" pop it to max and boom much less lag !!!

try it out it surely worked for me

if you allready knew this im sorry for wasting your time.

Have a Great Day You All
What does alter "Max Physics delta-time Per Frame"? Does physics go completly different?
